titleStmt.title: A compendious prologue, or Epilogue to the duply-tripartite-patheticall, unpublished studies (animadvertory, suppeditatory, to the Kings Majesty, his dominions and adherents) of J.T. (a hearty wel-willer to his King and conntry [sic]) since the incursion of these intestine wars, &c. being a conservatory dilation, and cordiall application, to the use and advantage of all in all.
titleStmt.author: J. T.
